tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
quoteDoc: Amazon Prime Video Terms of Use
quoteText:
Some of the subscription services that we offer are from third parties.
Third parties that provide subscription services (for example, through Prime Video Channels) may change or discontinue the features of their services or the content in their services.
Amazon is not responsible for the content contained in any third-party subscription service or the features of these services.
